snippet.title: Derail Valley: Overhauled - Trailer / May 21, 2020
snippet.description:
HELP US ADD MORE CONTENT:
http://www.derailvalley.com/unlocks/

Derail Valley: Overhauled is a major free update to Derail Valley, coming to PC and PC VR headsets on May 21, 2020. The update will fix most of the game's issues so far, revamp many existing systems, and add new content and features.

Closer to the release date we will have a series of in-depth video updates, showing more details.

Derail Valley on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/588030/
Derail Valley on Oculus store:
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1364142430316562/
Derail Valley site:
http://www.derailvalley.com/
